trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*"></xref> operation to a particular recipient.
Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the error message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified status code and e-mail address.

This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `failedRecipient` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the e-mail address.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> classes.
This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error that occurred.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified status code, e-mail address, and server response.

This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `failedRecipient` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the e-mail address.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the server response.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message, e-mail address, and inner exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error that occurred.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the e-mail address.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Indicates the e-mail address with delivery difficulties.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the e-mail address.

Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
Any objects that are included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that specifies the destination for this serialization.

Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance, which holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instance that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
